entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Expose Vector512<T> to support the x86/x64 AVX-512 instruction set #73262
    8.0.0
  • [Mono] Intrinsify loading/storing, reordering, and extracting a per-element "mask" API's of Vector{64, 128, 256} #73261
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json should handle attributes in virtual properties consistently #73255
    8.0.0
  • Memory usage regression #73254
    7.0.0
  • GC/API/GC/GetGCMemoryInfo/GetGCMemoryInfo.sh test failing intermittently on CoreCLR Linux ARM32 #73247
  • "native" instruction set alias for AOT compilers #73246
    Future
  • Seemingly making NaN the lowest number only affects Min not Max. #73240
    8.0.0
  • CultureInfo is not returning proper system language on Mac Big Sur (Version 11.6) M1 (ARM64) #73237
  • Ping class responding Timedout not reading response when ICMP Time-to-live exceeded. #73232
  • [API Proposal]: Add TResource in RateLimitPartition.Factory #73231
  • [QUIC] CONNECTION_TIMEOUT may be misreported as IDLE_TIMEOUT #73229
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.ReadJson #73242
  • [API Proposal]: Access Regex group without allocations #73223
    Future
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-rc.1.22379.5] Unable to bind IList<string> type from appsettings.json with Configuration.Binder #73221
    7.0.0
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-rc.1.22379.5] NamedPipeServerStream.WaitForConnectionAsync() method throw "The operation was canceled." exception #73220
  • JSON needs object initializer equivalent APIs #73219
    8.0.0
  • BinaryReader read performance regression #73250
  • CI failure: Assertion `<disabled>' not met in normal-system.xml.xmlserializer.tests #73213
    7.0.0
  • CI failure: system.security.cryptography.openssl.tests missing libssl #73210
    7.0.0
  • Regex Compiled and Source generated engines are loosing some state causing backtracking to be incomplete and fail finding matches for some cases. #73209
    7.0.0
  • Regex parser is not reducing some loops which causes some patterns to not be able to avoid catastrophic backtracking #73208
    Future
  • Regex parser doesn't ignore vertical tabs in patter when using RegexOptions.IgnorePatternWhiteSpace #73206
    Future
  • [mono][android] TargetSDKVersion=31 run on android12 os will hit assert. #73197

Closed

  • Update zlib (zlib-Intel) to 1.2.12 #69652
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Type.GetEnumValuesAsUnderlyingType #72498
    7.0.0
  • AOT Release shared library does not respect override methods #73076
  • LibraryImportGenerator ModeThatUsesBidirectionalShape_Missing_AllMethods_ReportsDiagnostic failure in CI #73127
    7.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions work planned for .NET 7 #64015
    7.0.0
  • [Feature] - Add TOML to the officially supported File Configuration Providers alongside INI, JSON, and XML #73119
  • Regression from hoisting out of nested loop #71059
    7.0.0
  • System.IO.Compression.GZipStream encrypt then decrypt results in diff byte sizes from original file #73192
  • ECMA-335 addendum should mention that null managed pointers are legal #69690
    7.0.0
  • HTTP/3: Enable by default? #73140
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json deserialize fails on List<Tuple<,>> with trimming #73169
  • SslSessionsCache growth on Linux with MTLS using many client certificates #71401
    7.0.0
  • System.Tests.Perf_Enum.EnumToString has regressed across multiple configurations #67909
    7.0.0
  • HTTP/3: Alt-Used incorrectly added to request #73123
    7.0.0
  • Implement a concept of "Required" properties #29861
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.RegexMatchTests.Match_VaryingLengthStrings_Huge #65289
    7.0.0
  • Deadlock on Linux with TaskCompletionSource.SetResult() #53166
    Future
  • VS2022 Blazor debugger can't read a long string from a variable #71552
    7.0.0
  • Nullable annotations: XmlNode.AppendChild #48456
    Future
  • JIT: Illegal return buffer/argument aliasing on native ABIs #72270
    7.0.0
  • Deterministic MVIDs is needed for assemblies referencing System.Private.CoreLib across different architectures #67660
    7.0.0
  • System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectNodes return should not be nullable #49131
    7.0.0
  • STJ failing ungracefully when attempting to serialize attributes #58947
    8.0.0
  • terminfo.terminfoverification #73212
    7.0.0
  • System.Net.Quic.Functional.Tests timing out #64944
    7.0.0
  • Documentation for HttpRequestMessage.Options and HttpRequestMessage.Properties #68164
    7.0.0
  • Cannot box a ByRef-like (ref struct) when using a CreateDelegate method on method that accepts a ByRef-like parameter. #72548
    7.0.0
  • Android developers can produce smaller apps when targeting .NET6 #45831
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] `startup.ts` has a fixed "max parallel downloads", but that can fail #68992
    7.0.0
  • XslCompiledTransform on .net Core Linux crashes - does not happen on Windows, or when enableDebug=true #52436
    Future
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Text.Encodings.Web.Tests.Perf_Encoders #69443
    7.0.0
  • System.Net.Http double check #70314
    7.0.0
  • Unable to remove windows audit permission using RemoveAuditRule c# #61015
  • System.Text.Tests.TranscodingStreamTests.ReadAsync_Memory(bufferLength: 1) failing in CI #60865
  • [MONO][Android][Interp] JIT/Methodical/* tests failed return the correct return code on Android x64 with interpreter #54382
    7.0.0
  • [MONO][Interp] Assertion: should not be reached at /__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/mini/interp/transform.c:5325 with interpreter #54381
    7.0.0
  • System.Net.Http.Json nuget package not receiving service updates #50914
    7.0.0
  • GenericCatchInterfaceProgram fails on mono #72827
  • terminfo.terminfoverification #73211
  • Expression.Convert fails to convert byte to nint. #61929
  • NativeMemory.Realloc crashes #73143
    7.0.0
  • Use .Net core console program how to obtain cpu/memory utilization #70872
  • [API Proposal]: Analyzer - check allocation non free code during compilation #70387
  • Create a kusto queries to monitor runtime tests related lanes on rolling build #61817
    7.0.0
  • [tests][Android] Executing assembly location mismatch /data/data/ and /data/user/ #62729
    7.0.0
  • Support for Android "Profiled AOT" in .NET 6 #56989
    7.0.0
  • System.Runtime.Loader.Tests fail on Android #36839
    7.0.0
  • ARM iOS build hung during CI #72829

PullRequests

Created

  • Add release branches to jitrollingbuild.yml #73276
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Typo in MULTIPLE_HEAPS to fix a memory usage regression #73275
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Expose the IBinaryInteger<T>.ReadBig/LittleEndian APIs #73274
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • ILASM - Removed special handling for method vararg calling convention when resolving member refs. #73273
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • Update images in windows build to preprovisioned tooling model #73272
  • Avoid integer overflow on ARM machine with 8G of memory #73271
    area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Update branding to 6.0.9 #73270
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix missing symbols for `singlefilehost` #73269
    area-Single-File
  • Add System.Threading.RateLimiting to Microsoft.Internal.Runtime.AspNetCore.Transport #73268
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix Configuration.Binder to bind to IList<T> properties #73267
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [MONO] Increased timeout for llvmfullaot lanes #73265
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono][interp] Make sure containing klass has field offsets initialized #73264
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [WIP] Consume ApiCompat's ValidateAssemblies task #73263
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix handling of empty iterations in Regex lazy loops #73260
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Fix InvalidCastException when casting a polymorphic converter #73259
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Re-enable System.IO.Pipes.Tests on iOS-based platforms #73258
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • Bracketed paste support #73257
    area-System.Console, 7.0.0
  • Switch to using ReadOnlySpan/SpanMarshaller for some generated p/invokes #73256
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Rename RateLimiter Acquire methods #73253
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/6.0] Respect the Keep-Alive response header on HTTP/1.0 #73245
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • JIT: Assign method handle for root inline context in all builds #73244
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add null checks in various XML methods #73243
    area-System.Xml
  • Extend detection for unsupported types #73241
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Remove redundant trimmer warning suppressions #73238
    linkable-framework
  • [iOS] Reenable skipped StructureToPtr tests #73236
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Fix IsNonBundledAssemblyLoadingSupported condition in PlatformDetection #73235
  • Fix string.Split handling of trimming with no replacements #73234
    area-System.Runtime
  • Consolidate importer spilling code V3 #73233
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Detect `new` keyword in derived members on GetProperties #73230
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • [QUIC] Improve idle timeout tests #73228
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Throw exception with correct QuicError for ConnectionTimeout #73227
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Update libraries-sdk.windows.Dockerfile #73225
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Fix sending end stream in http2 web socket stream #73222
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Enable async runtime suspension and return hijacking on unix-arm64 #73216
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Throw invalid program if stack state is invalid #73215
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Enable 4 more libraries tests #73214
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • support InfiniteTimeSpan in Select #73204
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Backport edge case fixes to XxHash32/XxHash64 #73203
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 6.0.x
  • NativeAOT tests interopservices #73200
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Annotate System.Data.Common with RequiresDynamicCode #73199
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enhance the date and time precision in Add methods #73198
    area-System.Runtime, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Update zlib, zlib-intel dependencies #73082
    area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.0
  • Implement new API GetEnumValuesAsUnderlyingType #73057
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation, CoreClr
  • Fix sealing of types that were not concretely instantiated #73218
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix execution of ilverify tests in outerloop runs #73132
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Make diagnostic checks more reliable with more exact result matching. #73178
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • avoid string concatenation in case when there are no Extended Strings #73239
    area-System.Console, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Bring back live host change #73095
  • Fix typo in Quic resource string #73249
    area-System.Net.Quic, 7.0.0
  • Describe the validity of null managed pointers #71794
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Enable HTTP/3 support by default #73153
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • JSON support required properties #73063
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono][debugger] Fix infinite recursion and null pointer access while debugging #73024
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Update ApiCompat baselines for NativeAOT System.Private.CoreLib #73248
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Reflection Invoke refactoring #73131
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable AOT analyzer in System.Net.HttpListener and System.Net.Http.Json #73191
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Disallow return buffer aliasing for unmanaged calls #73059
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update fabricbot config per dotnet/fabricbot-config#59 #73207
    area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] amend the LA-ABI for GCStress testing. #73205
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Respect the Keep-Alive response header on HTTP/1.0 #73020
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Add reference assembly for System.Private.CoreLib.dll #72143
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono] Skip .mibc profile methods when not found #73066
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Consume renamed ApiCompat.Task package #72464
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove reflection usage from Console tests #73224
    area-System.Console, 7.0.0
  • [mono][aot] AOT ptr-to-structure and structure-to-ptr wrappers for no… #73013
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [iOS] Remove unnecessary newline from CI script #67861
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-tvos
  • Enable MsQuicTests.ConnectWithClientCertificate on Windows #70015
    area-System.Net.Quic, 7.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Fixup C exports initialization after startup.ts refactoring #73158
    arch-wasm, area-Threading-mono, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] re-try downloading assets #72933
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Tweak XML comments on BrotliStream and ZLibStream #73179
    area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.0
  • Add setter to TransactionManager.DefaultTimeout and MaxTimeout. #71703
    area-System.Transactions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono][interp] Throw exception if stack is not empty after localloc #73176
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1917206 #73202
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono] Don't allow interfaces as catch classes to catch anything. #73165
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix grammar typo in comment in TplEventSource.cs #73201
    community-contribution
  • Wrap FileSystemEntry buffer in a struct to workaround visibility issues with api compat #73182
    area-System.IO
  • Add all memory allocation ucrtbase APIs to the hardbound list #73190
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix xxHash64 handling of large (> 4GB) inputs #73093
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Fix duplicate reference issue #73193
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

Updated

  • Do not check object references for equality after hot reload #73009
    area-System.Reflection
  • Add the ability to load a PKCS10 into CertificateRequest #73023
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact, 7.0.0
  • DCS alignment to 4.8 with schema support #71752
    area-Serialization, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Added DEBUG switches for roundtrip ILASM #72128
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix delegate invokes returning byref types. #72978
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Improve morphing of bit comparisons to constant 0/1 #73120
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Annotating System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource on AOT #72706
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add local build for System.Globalization shim #72896
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Ldap search crashes on Linux when timeout specified #72676
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Port the incremental source generator polyfill code to the 6.0 servicing branch. #72219
    Servicing-approved, area-Meta, 6.0.9
  • Fix x64 and x86 emulation on arm64 Windows #72693
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Try to keep cache value after startup validation when current Options is default unnamed one #72927
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution
  • [wasm] EmccCompile: Add support for compiling sequentially #67483
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, no-recent-activity, needs-author-action
  • Fix json Serializer (all Proprties should be used) #73121
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [wip][wasm] deprecate legacy JS API and propose new #73068
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [TEST] Ctor_Dispose_HandleClosedIfOwnsHandle #73168
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [MONO] Move marshal-ilgen into a component #71203
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] marshling call to assembly entrypoint via new interop #73156
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix insert a breakpoint in sources with same prefix. #73163
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Breakpoint set in a invalid line, set it to the next available line #73189
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [QUIC] Copy managed memory instead of pinning #72746
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add Kerberos loopback test #71824
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Add new version of the ContentionStart event #72627
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • increase timeout on ZeroByteRead_IssuesZeroByteReadOnUnderlyingStream test #73196
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • changing CPU from int to double #66743
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Add support for X509ChainPolicy for QUIC #73056
    area-System.Net
  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 12.0.3 to 13.0.1 in /src/libraries/Common/tests/System/Net/Prerequisites/NetCoreServer #71180
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, .NET
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the wrong GCInfo when testing GCStress. #72572
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • #51390 check if test still fails #72925
    area-System.IO
  • enable OpenSSL tests on arm64 mac #72294
    area-System.Security, os-mac-os-x, 7.0.0
  • Optimize the SqlGuid struct #72549
    area-System.Data.SqlClient, community-contribution
  • [wasm] fix logging in subtle crypto #73073
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Remove 1024 character limit on ODBC connection strings #73155
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Data.Odbc, 6.0.9
  • [PERF][MAUI] Update global.json default and Version of dotnet used to test net7 Maui #73171
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • WIP: Testing mono llvmfullaot with interpreter as a fallback instead of GSHAREDVTs #72443
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Revert "[mono][interp] Improve tiering performance (dotnet#70649)" #73187
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Enable inlining P/Invokes into try blocks with no catch or filter clauses #73032
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • Add innerException to ResourceReader when it doesn't support serialization #72957
    area-System.Resources
  • [release/6.0] Support zero-byte reads on raw response streams in SocketsHttpHandler #72804
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Add lowering support for conditional nodes #71705
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add CancellationToken-accepting overloads for SendPingAsync #72338
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add Span.Reverse() intrinsic for Arm64 #72780
    community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [debugger] First draft of managed debugger on wasi #67272
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • [DRAFT] Debugging Span.Reverse #73157
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Tar: restore directory permissions while extracting. #72078
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Adapt System.CommandLine (v2) in more places #72082
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Return null for localloc with len 0 #73174
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Improve Binary Xml (XmlDictionaryWriter) performance #71478
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Trying to add support for building WBT with multiple runtime packs #72815
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [Android] Introduce NetTraceToMibcConverter task & streamline testing targets #72394
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Update Arcade + Workloads #72947
  • Optimize Enumerable.Chunk #73134
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Fix ProcessorCount calculation on Windows 11 #68639
    area-System.Threading
